page.title: 05WORKING BOATS
page.content: Most Flushing working boats are typically Cornish,within the size of about 20-30 Ft.Long working boats in Flushing were used for oyster dredging and with a shallow keel could get up river in rather shallow conditions working boats nowadays are used mostly for racing,and pleasure. They are usually "home-made" but when used to be working boats they were built up the river in places like Gweek,Feock and Mylor: Here are some boats that race today and there builders. BOATS BUILDERS Victory Hitchens of Feock May Blossom Porthleven Softwings Hitchens of Feock Zona Mevegissey Royal Oak Unknown
